name: Knowledge Graph
description: Semantic knowledge graph for storing and querying entities, relationships, and concepts. Enables AI-powered knowledge management and traversal.
author: AlephNet

tools.name: query_knowledge
tools.description: Query the knowledge graph for entities and relationships using subject/predicate/object patterns

tools.name: add_knowledge
tools.description: Add new knowledge to the graph with entities and relationships

tools.name: get_related_entities
tools.description: Traverse the knowledge graph to find related entities

tools.name: search_knowledge
tools.description: Search entities by text query and type

settings.label: Max Nodes
settings.description: Maximum number of nodes to display in the graph visualization

settings.label: Default Traversal Depth
settings.description: Default depth of relationships to traverse when exploring nodes

settings.label: Auto Expand
settings.description: Automatically expand related nodes when selecting a node

settings.label: Persist Graph
settings.description: Save graph to storage between sessions
